bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with gan chuang 疳瘡 , gan- illness sores. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 50 : 疳濕之 病…其上蝕者，則口鼻齒齦生瘡；其下蝕者，則肛門傷爛，皆難治 , “The disease of gan -illness with moisture . ...If the erosion affects the upper body parts, sores develop at the mouth, the nose, the teeth, and the gums. In case it affects the lower body parts, the anus will be harmed and festers. All these conditions are difficult to cure”.
